outputs.output_descr: This project aims at rehabilitating and developing the destroyed agricultural facilities in the Gaza Strip where the agricultural sector has been severely affected due to the frequent Israeli incursions in the area over the past five years. The project will be targeting the cultivated areas in the Gaza Strip, where the large portion of the population depends on the agricultural activities in making their living. The project will be carried out to the maximum extent possible by labor-intensive methods, responding to the urgent need for employment opportunities. It is estimated that the project will allow for the creation of approximately 44,829 workdays for poor unemployed workers from the targeted areas. The project will mainly focus on rehabilitating and reconstructing the destroyed water wells and greenhouses.

project_descr: The Project aims to create short term job opportunities for unemployed poor workers from the GS through the rehabilitation of destroyed agricultural greenhouses & water wells, which would generate long term jobs thus contributing to poverty alleviation.
project_title: Employ. Generation thru Rehab. of Agr. Facilities in GS
